Items.Title: A Local Law to amend the administrative code of the city of New York, in relation to requiring certain buildings or structures to undergo a structural inspection.
Items.ActionText: This Introduction was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: Requiring any building or structure that has been vacant for three years or longer to be inspected prior to the issuance of any permit to alter, repair, remove or enlarge that building or structure.
